name: The lone lighthouse
description: I feel, lighthouses are the epitome of solitude. I don’t know why but there’s a sense of nostalgia associated with it. What could be more nostalgic than watching a lighthouse as the time passes over it. I tried to communicate that feeling by digitally recording a time-lapse (sequence of still images) and color graded the video to simulate the 16 mm film negative.  Now, what could be more nostalgic than watching a lighthouse shot on 16 mm film?  Here are the Specs. What: Video / Format: MP4 / Duration: 11 Seconds / Resolution: 1920 x 1080 / Aspect Ratio: Academy Ratio 1.37:1 (letterbox) / Compilation of a sequence of 213 still images playing at 24 images per second to give an illusion of the passage of time. Digitally produced and color graded to simulate 16 mm film.
